Class VimeoResponse

Description
Description | Descendents | Methods (details)

Vimeo response class

Every API response class will be based on this. It also handles everytime response variables like if the query was successfull and the generation time.

  • abstract:

Located in /lib/class.vimeo.php (line 963)
